targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_model AS (
  SELECT model_version
  FROM model_registry
  WHERE model_name = 'aqpy_nn_temperature'
  ORDER BY trained_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT predicted_for AS "time", yhat AS "nn"
FROM predictions
WHERE model_name = 'aqpy_nn_temperature'
  AND target = 'temperature'
  AND horizon_step = 1
  AND model_version = (SELECT model_version FROM latest_model)
ORDER BY predicted_for;

WITH latest_model AS (
  SELECT model_version
  FROM model_registry
  WHERE model_name = 'aqpy_ar_temperature'
  ORDER BY trained_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT predicted_for AS "time", yhat AS "adaptive_ar"
FROM predictions
WHERE model_name = 'aqpy_ar_temperature'
  AND target = 'temperature'
  AND horizon_step = 1
  AND model_version = (SELECT model_version FROM latest_model)
ORDER BY predicted_for;

WITH latest_model AS (
  SELECT model_version
  FROM model_registry
  WHERE model_name = 'aqpy_rnn_temperature'
  ORDER BY trained_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT predicted_for AS "time", yhat AS "gru_lite"
FROM predictions
WHERE model_name = 'aqpy_rnn_temperature'
  AND target = 'temperature'
  AND horizon_step = 1
  AND model_version = (SELECT model_version FROM latest_model)
ORDER BY predicted_for;

SELECT recorded_at AS "time", holdout_mae AS "nn"
FROM online_training_metrics
WHERE model_name = 'aqpy_nn_temperature' AND source_target_col = 'temperature'
ORDER BY recorded_at;

SELECT recorded_at AS "time", holdout_mae AS "adaptive_ar"
FROM online_training_metrics
WHERE model_name = 'aqpy_ar_temperature' AND source_target_col = 'temperature'
ORDER BY recorded_at;

SELECT recorded_at AS "time", holdout_mae AS "gru_lite"
FROM online_training_metrics
WHERE model_name = 'aqpy_rnn_temperature' AND source_target_col = 'temperature'
ORDER BY recorded_at;
